17. A 97 0.11 = $81.82
18. B 4.5 765 = 0.0692 or 6.92%
19. A To get the annual payment, enter PV = –10,000; FV = 0; I/Y = 10; N = 10;
CPT + PMT = 1,627.45. The first year's interest is $1,000 = 10,000 x 0.10, so the
principal balance going into year 2 is 10,000 – 627.45 = $9,372.55. Year 2 interest
= $9,372.55 x 0.10 = $937.26.
